nodes.text: Flitrude was a green and brown colored moon that orbited the planet Iego, which was located in the Outer Rim Territories at Standard Galactic Grid coordinates T-7. Like the rest of rest of Iego's 1,000 moons, Flitrude was as mysterious as the planet itself.

Flitrude was mentioned in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia. The art used for the moon in the Visual Encyclopedia originated in a piece of concept art title "Iego 1000 Moons" that was drawn by Jackson Sze on October 3, 2007 for Mystery of a Thousand Moons, an episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The moon did not appear in the episode itself.
